title: Diploma Program
description: A comprehensive two-year software development diploma program designed to equip students with foundational and advanced programming skills.

title: Post Diploma Program
description: A one-year post-diploma program designed to enhance your software development skills with advanced concepts and hands-on projects.

title: Certificate Program
description: A six-month certificate program providing practical, industry-relevant skills for software development beginners or professionals seeking specialization.

title: Software Project Management
description: Focuses on agile and scrum methodologies, preparing students to plan, manage and lead software development projects effectively.

title: Cybersecurity Program
description: An intensive cybersecurity course covering network defense, ethical hacking, and data protection best practices.

title: Mobile Application Development
description: Develop mobile apps for Android and iOS using frameworks like React Native and Flutter, with strong focus on UI/UX design.

title: Cloud Computing Program
description: Learn to deploy scalable cloud-based applications using AWS, Azure and Google Cloud services, focusing on DevOps and architecture.

title: Artificial Intelligence & Data Science
description: Covers fundamentals of AI, machine learning, and big data analytics using Python, TensorFlow, and Power BI for real-world applications.

title: Game Development Program
description: Learn to create engaging video games using Unity and Unreal Engine. Focuses on gameplay programming, physics, and 3D environment design.
